pages.text: $(#9d1e2d)$(bold)END THE LIVING NEAR THE CRUCIBLE'S MAW. THEIR LIFE FORCE WILL BE GATHERED.$(br2)NOT ALL CREATURES ARE EQUAL IN VALUE.
$(o)Did I scare you? Seriously, though, it's a good source of Vital Power.$(p)If you're out of things to slaughter, consider what helps you regain health to discover other sources.
